content.rendered:
Directed by Adhaar Khurana. Akarsh Khurana.

Written by Tarun Dudeja. Parijat Joshi. Unaiza Merchant. Divya Rao. Anant Tripathi.

Cast Taaruk Raina (Lucky Kohli). Sumeet Vyas (Gaurav Bhati). Arjun Mathur (Tarush Khetrapal). Parambrata Chattopadhyay (Bijoy Das). Ahsaas Channa (Ayesha Rehman). Lukram Smil (Kenny Laishram). Gopal Datt (Nadeem Dalvi). Himika Bose (Aarti Chatterjee). Priyank Tiwari (Nishant Kumar). Aamir Mallick (Prashant Bharti). Danish Sood (Gagan Kishore). Kavya Trehan (Aparna Bansal). Tanvi Azmi (Kamala Reddy). Akash Khurana (Dharmaesh Mistry). Adhir Bhat (Bobby Nagra). Puneet Chhabra (Bumpy ji). Mohit Mathur (Amit). Rishabh Bhagat (Rishabh (Nadeem’s Gang)). Aradhya Sharma (Baljeet Grewal). Priyansh Lamba (Modern Times Intern). Rajendra Bhatia (Publisher). Richa Mohan (University professor)
Language Hindi.

Producers Ashish Heblekar. Abhay S. Dutta. Sumit S. Rajput. Radhika Loya. Sanjeevkumar Nair.

Production Lionsgate India.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
